snippet: The Mets scored all of their runs in the final four innings to earn their first sweep at Citizens Bank Park since 2006.
abstract: New York Mets defeat Philadelphia Philles, 10-6.
lead_paragraph: The Mets scored all of their runs in the final four innings to earn their first sweep at Citizens Bank Park since 2006.

headline.seo: Mets Beat Phillies to Finish Sweep
headline.main: Mets Make Themselves at Home in Philadelphia
headline.print_headline: Mets Make Themselves At Home in Philadelphia
